```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, cache = TRUE)
library(lifeswork)
library(tidyverse)
library(usethis)

library(dontpanic)

```


```{zsh clear deets, eval=FALSE}
rm ~/Downloads/Details-20170101-20200228*


```



```{r import data, eval=FALSE}
# get data via horrible manual export
measures <- get_measures(
  "~/Downloads/Details-20170101-20200228.csv")

```

```{r write data, eval=FALSE}
# write data
use_data(measures, overwrite = TRUE)

```


```{r roxygen}
# generate roxygen for dontpanic measured based on current datasets.

map2_chr(.x = measures %>% pluck("data") %>% names(),
     .y = measures %>% pluck("description"),
     .f = function(x, y) {
  paste0("#' \t \\item{", x, "}{", y, "}\n", collapse = "")})%>% cat()

```
